title: How to Make Agar Agar Dodol from Palembang

steps.headline: Prepare the pan cooking, wooden spatula, spoons, glass and agar-agar mold
Mix all of the ingredients into the pan one by one, first add 8 glasses of water
After that, add 4 pack of brown or white agar-agar powder
And then, 200 gram of coconut milk.
Don’t forget to put 2 pieces of pandan leaves into pan.
steps.description: After all of the ingredients are mixed, stir until dough is well blended. Then, cook on the stove over low heat.

steps.headline: Stir until the dough boil maybe around 10 minutes.
steps.description: After boiling, let stand about 5 minutes until the dough is completely cooked and thickened, while stirring occasionally.

steps.headline: After it’s ripe, turn off the heat and immediately pour into the mold.
steps.description: It will be better if you put the mold on the basin filled with water, so that the dough of agar-agar dodol will be chill.

steps.headline: After agar-agar dodol be chill, don’t forget to put in refrigerator because It will make the taste is more delicious.
steps.description: And agar-agar dodol ready to serve.

text: Prepare the pan cooking, wooden spatula, spoons, glass and agar-agar mold  Mix all of the ingredients into the pan one by one, first add 8 glasses of water  After that, add 4 pack of brown or white agar-agar powder  Next, pour 300 gram sugar  Add 200 gram of palm sugar.  And then, 200 gram of coconut milk.  Pour 1 pack chocolate powder.  Add 1 can of chocolate milk.  Don’t forget to put 2 pieces of pandan leaves into pan. After all of the ingredients are mixed, stir until dough is well blended. Then, cook on the stove over low heat. Stir until the dough boil maybe around 10 minutes. After boiling, let stand about 5 minutes until the dough is completely cooked and thickened, while stirring occasionally. After it’s ripe, turn off the heat and immediately pour into the mold. It will be better if you put the mold on the basin filled with water, so that the dough of agar-agar dodol will be chill. After agar-agar dodol be chill, don’t forget to put in refrigerator because It will make the taste is more delicious. And agar-agar dodol ready to serve. Finished.
